content: this mystery knit-along will end up with a pair of socks on christmas eve there will be a new part released each day in december 1-24 the idea is to use leftover yarns mini-skeins or an advent calendar worth of yarns to knit these that said you could also have a lovely pair of socks with a single yarn if you choose that option your best plan would be to use a solid semi-solid or tonal yarn this is a beginner-friendly and relaxed pattern and knit along no one needs extra stress during december that said every part of the pattern is different so it shouldn t be boring to experienced knitters there will also be flexibility as to how long to knit each day s section so as to adjust for desired leg and foot length knitalong will be hosted in the fgf the sock group 1 **note i am updating the pattern each day it will be too complicated to find what you want if there are 24 separate pdfs ** **materials ** approximately 100 gms of fingering weight sock yarn **gauge** 8 sts and 11 rnds = 1 inch **sizes ** 7 8 9 10 inch circumference **note ** if you want to add more fun to this mystery knit wrap up 24 small balls or skeins of yarn and unwrap one each day to knit the next portion of the pattern 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/fgf-the-sock-group
